tika-s0304t3:2_0: 314.Nibbānaṁāgammāti ettha āgammāti sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho.
tika-s0304t3:2_1: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṁ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṁ paramassāsabhāvena
tika-s0304t3:2_2: vimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādike khepetīti
tika-s0304t3:2_3: taṁsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṁ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvato “nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgo khīyatī”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_3: Addhā attanoti vakkhati “parassa kilesakkhayena parassa nibbānasampatti na yuttā”ti.
tika-s0304t3:3_4: Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayappattitā ca āpannāti āha –
tika-s0304t3:3_6: Nanu ārammaṇakaraṇamattena kilesakkhayo anuppattoti na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_9: Gotrabhūpi maggena yā kilesānaṁ anuppattidhammatā kātabbā,
tika-s0304t3:3_12: Na hi aññe dhammā viya nibbānaṁ,
tika-s0304t3:3_13: taṁ pana atigambhīrattā appattena ālambituṁ na sakkā,
tika-s0304t3:3_14: tasmā tena gotrabhunā pattabbena tikālikasabhāvātikkantagambhīrabhāvena bhavitabbaṁ,
tika-s0304t3:3_15: kilesakkhayamattataṁ vā icchato gotrabhuto puretaraṁ nipphannena kilesakkhayena bhavitabbaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_16: Appattakilesakkhayārammaṇakaraṇe hi sati gotrabhuto puretaracittānipi ālambeyyunti.
tika-s0304t3:4_2: Rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammātiādīsūti ādisaddena lokuttaraanāsavādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t3:4_5: Kilesakkhayamattatāya hi sati nibbānassa bahutā āpajjati “yattakā kilesā khīyanti,
tika-s0304t3:4_7: Abhāvassabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvo asaṅkhatādibhāvo ca na siyā,
tika-s0304t3:4_10: Yasmā ca sammutisaccārammaṇaṁ saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṁ vā samucchedavasena kilese pajahituṁ na sakkoti,
tika-s0304t3:4_11: yato mahaggatañāṇaṁ vipassanāñāṇaṁ vā kilesavikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgavasena vā pajahati,
tika-s0304t3:4_12: tasmā ariyamaggañāṇassa sammutisaccasaṅkhatadhammārammaṇehi viparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:4_13: Tathā hi taṁ samucchedavasena kilese pajahīti evaṁ parinipphannāsaṅkhatasabhāvaṁ nibbānanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
tika-s0304t3:7_2: Suṭṭhu gatāti sammā gatā paṭipannāti sugatā.
tika-s0304t3:7_4: Dukkhasaṅkhātoti “dukkha”nti saṅkhātabbo viditabbo ca dukkhasabhāvo dhammo dukkhadukkhatā.
tika-s0304t3:7_5: Yasmā dukkhavedanāvinimuttasaṅkhatadhamme sukhavedanāya ca yathā idha saṅkhāradukkhatā vipariṇāmadukkhatāti dukkhapariyāyo niruppateva,
tika-s0304t3:7_6: tasmā dukkhasabhāvo dhammo ekena dukkhasaddena visesetvā vutto “dukkhadukkhatā”ti.
